title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 22.23 - Records and facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 22.23 - Records and facilities

State Regulations

Each dealer shall maintain and make available to the
commissioner, or his designee, during the usual hours of business all such
records and facilities as the commissioner deems necessary to verify the data
reported pursuant to sections 22.20 through
22.22
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
22.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
